European users are advised to filter column "Sold in Europe" and delete the rows marked with "NO".
Western European users can further delete the rows marked with "Only Russia", "Eastern Europe", etc.
Eastern European users can further delete the rows marked with "Only UK" but are advised to not delete, because some used cars from UK are now on the roads of Eastern Europe.
